title: Potential Buffer Overflow in _tcscpy_s
description: _tcscpy_s is used to copy strings into a fixed-size buffer (args). However, the size of args is 256 characters, and the source string can be longer than this. This could lead to a buffer overflow if the source string exceeds 255 characters.
fix: Use _tcsncpy_s instead of _tcscpy_s to ensure that the destination buffer does not overflow. Also, check the length of the source string before copying it.
